Uses of Class
org.eclipse.jface.bindings.Binding

  • Packages that use Binding 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.jface.bindings
    Provides support for bindings between commands and various user input events (e.g., keyboard shortcuts).
    org.eclipse.jface.bindings.keys
    Provides support for bindings between commands and keys.
    org.eclipse.ui.keys
    Provides support for integrating keys into the Eclipse workbench.

    • Uses of Binding in org.eclipse.jface.bindings

      Methods in org.eclipse.jface.bindings that return Binding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Binding[] BindingManager.getBindings()
      Returns the set of all bindings managed by this class.
      Binding BindingManager.getPerfectMatch(TriggerSequence trigger)
      Returns the command identifier for the active binding matching this trigger, if any.
      Methods in org.eclipse.jface.bindings with parameters of type Binding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BindingManager.addBinding(Binding binding)
      Adds a single new binding to the existing array of bindings.
      void BindingManager.removeBinding(Binding binding)
      Remove the specific binding by identity.
      void BindingManager.setBindings(Binding[] bindings)
      Changes the set of bindings for this binding manager.

    • Uses of Binding in org.eclipse.jface.bindings.keys

      Subclasses of Binding in org.eclipse.jface.bindings.keys 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeyBinding
      A keyboard shortcut.

    • Uses of Binding in org.eclipse.ui.keys

      Methods in org.eclipse.ui.keys that return Binding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Binding[] IBindingService.getBindings()
      Returns the current set of bindings.
      Binding IBindingService.getPerfectMatch(TriggerSequence trigger)
      Returns the command identifier for the active binding matching this trigger, if any.
      Methods in org.eclipse.ui.keys with parameters of type Binding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IBindingService.savePreferences(Scheme activeScheme, Binding[] bindings)
      Writes the given active scheme and bindings to the preference store.
